properties.areaDesc: Galveston Island and Bolivar Peninsula; Matagorda Islands; Brazoria Islands
properties.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 20 at 3:21AM CST until February 21 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Houston/Galveston TX
properties.description:
* WHAT...North winds increasing to 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to
35 mph expected.

* WHERE...Matagorda Islands, Brazoria Islands and Galveston
Island and Bolivar Peninsula Counties.

* WHEN...From 3 PM this afternoon to 6 AM CST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects.
Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may
result.
properties.instruction:
Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high
profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

NWSheadline: WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 6 AM CST FRIDAY
